Brandon is plotting to assassinate Mr. Golek, Sainz is his collaborator, the Masked Buster is preventing it, and Jakov is his real
identity! There are so many things happening at once, I don't know what to be surprised about anymore! Anyway, congratulations to the
winners! Even if the Battlympics was a conspiracy, your strength to survive is real.

41743.「おお <pc>じゃねえか。\n お前もすっかり バトルマスターの\n 貫禄が:
Oh, , isn't it? You've got the dignity of a battlemaster, haven't you? I was going to give you one last lesson, but I

41744.「……バトルマスターの証を賭けて か。\n あいつ ずっと こだわってたんだな。:
Betting on Proof of BTL? He must have been persistent all along. He even broke out of jail. Well, that's why I'm going to change my
plans and substitute a duel with Sainz for my final training. Depending on the content of the fight, I may give up my Proof of BTL.
Don't tell me you won't take it?

41745.「一度 勝った相手だから 余裕ってか？\n ……だがな ただ 勝つだけじゃ\n:
You think you can afford to lose because you've already won once? But just winning is not enough to win Proof of BTL. Sainz is
probably desperate enough to break out of jail, so there's no guarantee he'll win. Well, we'll just have to stay on our toes. Old
Orseco Arena is located in the southwestern part of Orseco Highlands in Ogreed Continent, so don't get lost at all!

41746.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「あん？ オメー:

46343.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「こんの ヌケサ:
You stupid fools! You lose because you think you can afford to lose to an opponent you've already beaten once! Hey! Let's go back to the

41759.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「ブランドンと:
Brandon and his pet Sainz should be managing just fine. But he won't last long in that body. Let's get back to the Old Orseco Arena
and settle this!

41760.「<pc>さん 聞いたかよ？\n 逃亡していた 大商人ブランドンが\n ついに:
Did you hear? Brandon, the big businessman on the run, has finally been captured. I guess that's how bad guys end up,
no matter how rich they are. God is watching over us.

41761.「セインズの奴なら ブランドンを連れて\n 自分から 牢獄に戻っていったよ。\n:
Sainz took Brandon back to jail on his own. He said he was going to confess his sins. The reason why he left me in the past was because
I couldn't change his idea that strength is everything. Well, no matter how much I, who was stronger than her to begin with, tried to
convince her, she wouldn't agree. After being defeated twice by you, who was supposed to be weaker than me, she finally woke up.
. You lived up to my expectations. You've passed your last training session. Take this with you as promised!

41762.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「バトルマスター:
Just because I gave up the Proof of BTL, it doesn't change the fact that I am your master. I'm going to use you as hard as I can from now
on, so you'd better brace yourself!

41763.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よう <pc>:
Hey . What, you came to ask about Master Cheery? I'm impressed. I'm impressed. Now all you need to do is to prepare a
souvenir or something, and you'll be a perfect apprentice. Of course, don't forget the lesson that a battlemaster should be a sword for
someone else.

49872.「ここは 冒険者の酒場。\n 旅人たちが 仲間をもとめて集まる\n 出会いと別れ:
This is an adventurer's tavern, where travelers gather for companionship, meeting and parting. You don't look familiar, do you?
Sorry to bother you, but I'm busy and won't be around for a while. If you need me at the tavern, you'll have to go to one of my
references in another town.

41496.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「あぁん？ なんだ:
Huh? What is it, you? What do you want with the famous battlemaster, Mr. Jakov? Ugggghh! Sorry. My head hurts from the hangover. To be
honest, I'm in no mood to deal with you. If you want to become a battlemaster, we'll talk about it another time! Ugh! Ggggggghhhh, it's
just a terrible headache. It's like being punched in the face by a newbie who just became a warrior and a martial artist and then
a battlemaster.

41497.「酒場にいる 飲んだくれのジェイコフは\n 昔は 教官を 務めるほどの\n 優秀:
I heard that Jakov, the drunk in the tavern, used to be an excellent battlemaster, even serving as an instructor. But now he's just a
drunk. If he asks you to become a battlemaster, don't take him up on it.

41498.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「グムムム……ううん:
Gummmm, gummm, gummm? What do you want from me? I'm battlemaster Jakov. Oh. Are you interested in being a battlemaster?
Battlemaster is good. He wields a greatsword hammer and is a professional fighter. How's that? Just hearing that makes you want to be a
battlemaster, doesn't it? If you have the will and the spirit, I'll even let you take a trial to become a battlemaster.

41499.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「チッ。なんだよ:

41506.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><turn_pc:

have to undergo a trial for a new job. Huh? Then what was that errand you ran earlier? That's that. I was trying to confirm whether

41507.「じゃ 転職の試練について 教えてやろう。\n この試練は これから オレが渡す:

changing jobs. This trial will be conducted by

41517.「それじゃ ズババッと 転職できるように\n してやらねーとな。\n いくぜ 必:
Then, I'll have to help you get a new job.
Let's go, desperately trying to change jobs!<se_nots battle_cmn da_hit_l>

41518.「それじゃ ごほうびだ。これ持ってけよ。\n まあ たいしたモンじゃねーけど。:

41519.「それから <%sEV_QUE_NAME5>は\n もう いらねーだろ？\n オ:
And you don't want <%sEV_QUE_NAME5> anymore,
do you? I'll get it for you.

60397.「さて これで オメーは\n バトルマスターに転職できるように\n なったわけだ:
Now, you can change your job to battlemaster. It's all thanks to my guidance. In short, you have become an apprentice of Master Jakov!
From now on, you should respect me as your teacher and devote yourself to me as my disciple. I will use you in various ways! But
you're no good to me right now. I'll use you in various ways. But I can't talk to you right now.

41520.「……あーあ。あんた ジェイコフから\n バトルマスターに転職するための試練を\:
Oh, no. You got a trial from Jakov to change your job to battlemaster, didn't you? You're going to have a hard time from now on. My
former apprentice, something like that, used to have a hard time with you.

41521.「オレの弟子になったからには これから\n ビシビシっと コキ使ってやんよ！<b:
Now that you have become my disciple, I will
use you vigorously from now on!<bw_break>

41522.「また しばらくして 用のひとつもできたら\n オメーに 頼むからよ。\n その:
If I need you again in a while, I'll ask you to do something for me. Until then, do some voluntary training. I'll just sit here and do
nothing until then.

41523.「でも 今のオメーじゃ 話にならん。\n とりあえず レベル１０以上の\n バト:
But, I can't talk to you right now. Go and become a level 10 or above battlemaster for now. Until then, I'll just sit here and do
nothing. Don't keep Master waiting too long.

10757000.「戦いの社交場 コロシアムへ ようこそ！\n ここでは 己のウデに自信のある 強:
Welcome to Coliseum, the social arena of battle! Here, strong men and women, confident in their abilities, compete day and night! I
see you are a traveler. We are sorry, but we are not accepting new player registrations at this time. Since we opened, we have been
inundated with requests for player registration, and we have our hands full managing so many players. However, you are
free to use the facilities in the Coliseum, so please feel free to stop by and see us! Also, on rare occasions, we may hold a tournament
for special participants only, so please feel free to join us then!

35801.「オレ コロシアムが オープンしたら\n 真っ先に 選手登録するつもりでね。\n:
When Coliseum opens, I'm going to be the first to register as a player. I've been waiting here for a long time. But when I took my eyes
off the road for a minute, I was the first one to register! I'm so sorry. Even now, when I think back to that frustrating moment, I hit
the battle. Thanks to that, I'm doing rather well.

35806.「酒場もあれば 宿屋もある。\n おまけに ヒマなときは\n バトルっていう 娯:
There are taverns and inns. In addition, there is no shortage of entertainment such as battles when you are not busy! This place
called Coliseum is really nice. I haven't been outside for 5 days now.

79463.「ここの掲示板には\n コロシアムの バトルグランプリに関する\n ランキングな:
The board here is used to post rankings and other information about the Coliseum battle grand prix. Lately, Timothy, who is also in
front of reception, is the most popular one. Also, Fighter Sainz is one of the names I've seen a lot. I have not seen Mr. Jakov at the
tavern in the basement lately. Well, it can't be helped if he's always drinking from noon onwards.

35809.「私の名は ティモシー。\n このコロシアムで ウデをみがく剣士だ。\n<br_:
My name is Timothy, and I'm a fencer here at
the Coliseum.
<br_break>

40698.「……とはいえ 今はまだ 肩慣らし程度だな。\n やはり 同程度にウデの立つ相手:
However, it's still just a shoulder test for now. After all, it is only when you fight an opponent of similar skill level that you can
test your skills.

35811.「何度 経験しても 試合の前というのは\n 身体がふるえるほど 緊張するもんだ。:
No matter how many times I've experienced it, I always get so nervous before a match that my body shakes. But I like it. I guess that's why
I participate in Coliseumbattle, to enjoy this feeling.
